com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser

Class FileSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.code.gtkjfilechooser.FileSearch

  • public class FileSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Find files and directories than contain the searched term (case insensitive).
    Author:
    c.cerbo

      private boolean isHidden(java.io.File file)

        public void setSearchHidden(boolean searchHidden)

      • setFileFilter

        public void setFileFilter(java.io.FileFilter fileFilter)
        Set a file filter for the search. If null, all files are accepted.
        Parameters:
        fileFilter -

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the current search.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the search in background. The in-progress results are returned to the FileSearch.FileSearchHandler.

      • scanFiles

        private void scanFiles(java.io.File file)

      • isHidden

        private boolean isHidden(java.io.File file)
        This method resolves a bug in the JDK: the current path (.) is wrongly interpreted as an hidden file.
